text:
– Provide details of each Emissions Trading Scheme (ETS) your organization is regulated by’ of
‘CDP Full Corporate Questionnaire’ (version May 2024).
Answer
The undertaking shall consider GHG emissions from the installations it operates that are subject
to regulated Emission Trading Schemes (ETS), including the EU-ETS, national ETS and non-EU ETS,
if applicable (ESRS E1 AR 44). The schemes that fall under this requirement, therefore, include not
